filter.name: SuppressionCommentFilter
filter.description: A Tag holds a suppression comment and its location, and determines whether the suppression turns checkstyle reporting on or off. <EOF>

property.name: offCommentFormat
property.description: Specify comment pattern to trigger filter to begin suppression.

property.name: onCommentFormat
property.description: Specify comment pattern to trigger filter to end suppression.

property.name: idFormat
property.description: Specify check ID pattern to suppress.

property.name: checkCPP
property.description: Control whether to check C++ style comments ({@code //}).

property.name: checkC
property.description: Control whether to check C style comments ({@code /* ... */}).
